title: Number of Burger King restaurants in the Asia Pacific region from 2012 to 2013
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of restaurants on the Y-axis for 12 different Countrys for 2 groups 2012, and 2013 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Country Australia, 2013 had the highest Number of restaurants 371.0 among the 2 groups and in Philippines, 2012 had the lowest Number of restaurants 29.0.
In Country Australia, 2012 had the maximum Number of restaurants and it saw the lowest in Country Philippines out of all 12 Countrys.
Country Australia and Philippines had the biggest gap of 328.0 between the highest and lowest Number of restaurants found for 2012.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 12 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups 2012, and 2013. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of restaurants.
Out of all 2 groups, 2013 had the highest Number of restaurants in Country Australia and 2012 had the lowest Number of restaurants in Country Philippines.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of restaurants on the Y-axis for 12 different Countrys for 2 groups 2012, and 2013 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Country Australia, 2013 had the highest Number of restaurants 371.0 among the 2 groups and in Philippines, 2012 had the lowest Number of restaurants 29.0.
In Country Australia, 2012 had the maximum Number of restaurants and it saw the lowest in Country Philippines out of all 12 Countrys.
Country Australia and Philippines had the biggest gap of 328.0 between the highest and lowest Number of restaurants found for 2012.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 12 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups 2012, and 2013. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of restaurants.
Country Australia had the maximum Number of restaurants among all 2 groups, and it was for 2013. The minimum Number of restaurants was observed in Country Philippines for 2012.
Among all the Countrys, 2012 had the highest Number of restaurants 357.0 in Country Australia and lowest value 29.0 in Country Philippines.
Country Australia and Philippines had the biggest gap of 328.0 between the highest and lowest Number of restaurants found for 2012.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Number of restaurants was found in case of 2012.
Averaging all 2 groups 2012, and 2013, the Country Australia is the maximum Number of restaurants and Thailand is the minimum Number of restaurants.
